short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sends page to Web Test Lab on uiFlowDesign

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Software Testing Made Easy. 

uiFlowDesign is a browser extension that allows developers and engineers to record activities on websites on Demand to create Automated Test. The activities are administered and managed via ATPT (Clicks To Live). ATPT allows:

- Create and manage components and activities to perform actions that constitute a test
- Connect multiple component to form a flow 
- Create and export flow groups
- Cover all flows with different crawlers/browsers under 1 test 
- Data-driven tests that feed input data dynamically
- Create concise summaries and detailed HTML reports
- Screenshots at every step of the test 


• No prior experience to testing is required.
• Inbuilt mechanisms to minimize maintenance caused by changes in the UI 
• Multiplatform Execution (windows/unix/Mac)
• Does not require skilled Automation Test Engineers
• Few clicks to master Automation!
